title: TikTok Is Funding Montana Users’ Suit Against Ban
description: The popular video service had deflected questions about its involvement in the creators’ lawsuit for more than a month.

title: Demand for Data Centers Is Soaring
description: The need for data centers has soared, fueled by remote work and the growth of high-speed streaming. But finding the necessary land and energy can be a challenge.

title: A.I. and TV Ads Were Made for Each Other
description: A string of uncanny videos show what generative A.I. and advertising have in common: They chew up the cultural subconscious and spit it back at us.

title: Tesla May Have Already Won the Charging Wars
description: Deals with Ford and G.M. will make it easier to find a charger but could give Elon Musk control of critical infrastructure.
